Compute if two vectors are intersecting or not.

Parameters:

p2Second poinf of vector 1
p3First point of vector 2
p4Second point of vector 2

Returns:
VECTOR3D_DONT_INTERSECT , VECTOR3D_COLLINEAR or VECTOR3D_DO_INTERSECT
